product_name: Alchemy Goods Pike Messenger Bag - 2014 Overstock
long_description: Comprised of reclaimed bicycle inner tubes and a seat belt strap, the water-resistant Pike messenger bag stylishly outfits environmentally-conscious trendsetters looking for a quality everyday bag.
